alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Hamilton; Saline; White; Williamson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 2:32AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern White, southeastern Williamson, Saline, southern Hamilton and Gallatin Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 232 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Mcleansboro to Galatia to near Creal Springs. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Galatia around 235 AM CDT. Harrisburg, Eldorado and Carrier Mills around 240 AM CDT. Norris City and Equality around 250 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Ridgway, Carmi and Shawneetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
